name: Cotton Candy Dream
description:
Fairies and magical shards may seem beatiful and surean, but there's danger just beyond the edge of the world. And a portal that only takes you right back to where you began.

W, A, S, D to move. R to restart. Loop through the portal again and again to pick up all the crystals. 

All assets created by Crissy Moss in Unity.

Find (and rate) on Ludum Dare 47 here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/cotton-candy-dream
